answers.answer: I am not a physican ,but the mom of a type one diabetic.  i would suggest that you callyour octor to get checked out.Knowing the warning signs for type 1 diabetes (juvenile diabetes) could save a child's life.Warning signs of type 1 diabetes (these may occur suddenly):Extreme thirstFrequent urinationSudden vision changesSugar in urineFruity, sweet, or wine-like odor on breathIncreased appetiteSudden weight lossDrowsiness, lethargyHeavy, labored breathingStupor, unconsciousnessIf your child exhibits one or more of these symptoms, call a doctor immediately.Please check back anf let us know how it goes

question: I am an eighteen year old girl.  I have been wondering if I could have diabetes for a while.  I have lower back pain and the pain runs down my leg and my toes often go to sleep.  I also drink a lot of liquid and urinate a lot.  I get faint when I stand up especially when I'm hot, although it hasn't happened for a while.  Sometimes my fingers/hands get tingly and shake a little. I have been quite moody although I always have been, and can be very forgetful. Maybe it is just stress?
title: diabetes symptoms, or nothing?
